alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 1:59AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. Isolated gusts in excess of 80 mph are possible along the immediate east slopes of the Rockies. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...From Noon today to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing snow and reduced visibility will become more limited as temperatures remain above freezing today, but drifting of snow could continue to impact some roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several days of strong winds are expected through Wednesday with lighter winds this morning increasing by early this afternoon. Winds may diminish at times late tonight and again Tuesday night.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
